creator: Jubelo
description:
{RHelp Topic{W:{x mystical

The {Bmystical{x discipline is all other things magical. All skills
dealing with magic, such as using wands and brewing potions, to casting
and scribing spells will be in the mystical group. Anyone wishing to create
a powerful mage, rune mage, or other powerful magic type will benefit the
most from this discipline.
